about_the_game:
Mitsuki, a high school girl, is caught up in an unprecedented disaster that comes out of nowhere.
And the town is filled with deformed monsters.
What is her destiny?

A fusion of light action and zombie horror,
A zombie action game supervised by Eiko Kano.

■System

This title is a 3D/TPS type zombie action game,
3D/TPS type zombie action game.
The player controls two characters by switching between them,
The player controls two characters, switching between them, and uses attacks such as “slashing” and “shooting” to kill the attacking zombies (called “Crimsonbies” in this game),

■Story

Shortly after an unprecedented disaster strikes Tokyo, a group of deformed creatures appear in front of Mitsuki as she struggles to get out of the subway and onto the surface.

The sudden attack leaves the protagonist, Mitsuki, confused and bewildered, but she decides to resist and fight.

Although she was hesitant to slay the human-shaped creatures, Mitsuki's swordsmanship, which she had trained in, was powerful enough to destroy the monsters.

This was also the moment when Mitsuki's destiny was set in motion.

■Operation Description (Xbox controller, default)

B Button： Attack / Decide
A Button： Run/Cancel
X Button： crouch
Y Button： Skip message
L Bumper： Evasive Action
R Bumper： Evasive action
L Trigger： Look (camera) left
R Trigger： Look (camera) right
L-stick： Movement
R-stick： Move camera
R-stick Button： Initialize Move Gaze (Camera)
Start/Menu： Menu
Back/View： Menu
D-pad Up： Switch Camera
D-pad Down： Switch character (when using Tsubame)

■Distribution Terms

・No prior permission required
・Free distribution range (can be open to the public up to the ending)
・Monetization is allowed.
We hope that you will not violate public order and morals, social conventions, or the terms and conditions of the distribution platform.
